Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I find feedback from teachers is bette than AI as ultimately they are the experts in not only the subject but also responsible for marking the assignment. AI will have to make assumptions regarding the marking when giving you feedback

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback always feels more reliable. There is a slight feeling of distrust when it comes to AI feedback

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from teachers tends to be more specific to the project and issue. Verbal communication with another person seems to be better than written communication with AI in terms of transfer of instructions and information
